question:
Consider the following schemes/projects launched by the Government:
  1. Saubhagya
  2. Kusum
  3. Sunrise
  4. UJALA
Which of the above are related to power sector?
explanation: The Union Budget 2018 has allocated close to Rs. 48,000 crore to set up the Kisan Urja Suraksha evam Utthaan Mahabhiyan (KUSUM). It will help to set up 28GW of combined solar capacity through solar pumps and will also incentivise farmers to shift to renewable energy. Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana (SAUBHAGYA) aims to provide energy access to all through last mile connectivity and electricity connections to all un-electrified households in rural as well as urban areas. Project Sunrise aims for the prevention of AIDS in the north-eastern states and has nothing to do with power sector. Ujala Scheme was launched with an aim of distributing LED Bulbs.
